scripts.dev: concurrently -n "Django+WS,React,Admin,Chatbot" -c "yellow,cyan,green,magenta" --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:backend:daphne" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:chatbot"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "Django+WS,React,Admin,Chat" -c "yellow,cyan,green,magenta" --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:backend:daphne" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:chatbot"
scripts.dev:clean: npm run kill-ports && npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && set PYTHONPATH=%CD% && set PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 && echo Starting Django + WebSocket server... && python manage.py runserver --asgi 8000
scripts.dev:backend:simple: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && set PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 && python manage.py runserver 8000
scripts.dev:backend:daphne: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && set PYTHONPATH=%CD% && set PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 && echo Starting Django + WebSocket server with Daphne... && ..\venv\Scripts\python.exe -m daphne -p 8000 --bind 0.0.0.0 nfc_hospital_system.asgi:application
scripts.dev:chatbot:unix: cd chatbot-server && source venv/bin/activate && python app.py
scripts.dev:db: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate
scripts.dev:ws-test: cd backend && echo Testing WebSocket connectivity... && .\venv\Scripts\python.exe -c "import asyncio; import websockets; print('WebSocket test completed')"
scripts.dev:setup: npm run install:all && npm run dev:db && npm run create:dirs
scripts.type:generate: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && python manage.py generateschema --file openapi-schema.yml && npm run type:convert
scripts.dev:backend:unix: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && export PYTHONPATH=$PWD && export PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 && echo 'Starting Django + WebSocket server...' && python manage.py runserver --asgi 8000
scripts.dev:backend:unix:daphne: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && export PYTHONPATH=$PWD && export PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 && echo 'Starting Django + WebSocket server with Daphne...' && ../venv/bin/python -m daphne -p 8000 --bind 0.0.0.0 nfc_hospital_system.asgi:application
